TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit InstallerTypeAttribute extends System.Attribute

Docs.summary: Specifies the installer for a type that installs components.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The class used for the installer must implement the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner> interface. Use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.InstallerTypeAttribute.InstallerType%2A> property to get the installer associated with this attribute.
For more information, see [Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string typeName) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of a <xref:System.Type> that represents the installer for the component this attribute is bound to. This class must implement .
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the name of the component's installer type.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Type installerType) cil managed

Docs.param: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the installer for the component this attribute is bound to. This class must implement .
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, when given a <xref:System.Type> that represents the installer for a component.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool Equals(object obj) cil managed

Docs.param: The object to test the value equality of.
Docs.summary: Returns whether the value of the given object is equal to the current .
Docs.returns: if the value of the given object is equal to that of the current; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 GetHashCode() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the hashcode for this object.
Docs.returns: A hash code for the current .

Docs.summary: Gets the type of installer associated with this attribute.
Docs.value: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type of installer associated with this attribute, or if an installer does not exist.
